WDY_CTLR_COMPOT.DESCRIPTION: Initialize component usage for Variant Maint
Call interface usage to reset selected variant
Handling for Suspending and Resuming an Application
Error Handling by Application Before Navigation
Method for non-action specific operations before navigation
Method for Validation of User Input
Method for Modifying the View Before Rendering
Method for Modifying the Context Menu

WDY_CTLR_COMPO_SOURCE_VRS.SOURCE_LINE: DATA lo_cmp_usage TYPE REF TO if_wd_component_usage.
DATA lo_interfacecontroller TYPE REF TO iwci_salv_wd_table .
DATA lt_carrid TYPE RANGE OF sflight-carrid.
DATA lt_connid TYPE RANGE OF sflight-connid.
DATA lt_fldate TYPE RANGE OF sflight-fldate.
SELECT * FROM sflight INTO TABLE lt_results
WHERE carrid IN lt_carrid AND connid IN lt_connid AND fldate IN lt_fldate.
IF sy-subrc EQ 0 AND sy-dbcnt GT 0.
READ TABLE lt_fields WITH KEY m_id = i_fieldname ASSIGNING FIELD-SYMBOL(<fs_field>).
i_componentusage_name = 'SEL_OPT' "This doesn't have to match the actual usage name.
* data lo_api_controller type ref to if_wd_view_controller.
* data lo_action type ref to if_wd_action.
